text: David Andrew Ipp AO QC (1938 - 8 October 2020) was a South African-born Australian lawyer and politician. He was the Commissioner of the NSW Independent Commission Against Corruption between 2009 and 2014. Between 1989 to 2002, he was a judge of the Supreme Court of Western Australia. Ipp was born in Johannesburg. Ipp died in Sydney on 8 October 2020 at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:South African politicians Category:Australian judges Category:Australian lawyers Category:Naturalised citizens of Australia Category:Politicians from New South Wales Category:People from Johannesburg
title: David Ipp
